description.displayText: Andrea is a dedicated, intelligent and personable young woman who I believe will add much to any organization smart enough to hire her. She comes from an excellent family, whom I have known for many years and regard as my good friends. Andrea has high integrity, lots of energy and a strong desire to make a difference in the world. I recommend her to you with reservation and encourage you to give her a chance to demonstrate her skills and talents.
